summary: Report of contact with subject written by Theodore F. PASSAVOY, and a memo of WH/4 comments, Meeting with Dr. MIRO Cardona on 6 October discussing propaganda efforts, commando action plan, request for arms for Escambray, information on arms received by Castro regime, proposal that Council go to Cuba with Commando Group and Establish a Government on Cuban Soil, views about judges and lawyers, members of the Revolutionary Council, probable Argentine rupture of relations with Cuba, MIRO to attend Homage to LACERDA (Brazilian who Precipitated QUADROS' resignation) on October 15, Propaganda Commission, MIRO's Views Relative to Supreme Court Justice or PRIO being Recognized as Head of a Provisional Government, Offices of Council (Consejo Revolucionario), MIRO's Views on Coordinating the Activities of Other Exile Groups, Telephone Conversation with MIRO on 7 October.
title: JMZIP/Operational - Contact with Dr. MIRO Cardona
